Package org.gbif.api.service.common

package org.gbif.api.service.common
  • Interfaces
    Class
    Description
    CrudService<T,W,K>
    A generic CRUD service interface for any writable entity.
    IdentityAccessService
    Identity service accessing a single user, in read-only.
    SearchService<T,P extends SearchParameter,R extends BaseSearchRequest<P>>
    Parameterized generic search interface that supports pagination.
    SuggestService<T,P extends Enum<?> & SearchParameter,R extends BaseSearchRequest<P>>
    Generic search interface for a suggest/autocomplete service.

    Deprecated.
